definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Steven Gerrard today backed calls for the introduction of goal-line technology.
sentences.chinese: 傑拉德今天表示了他對引入球門線技術的支持。

sentences.english: The football bounced off the goalpost.
sentences.chinese: 足球擊中球門門柱彈了出去。

sentences.english: If you play according corner flag, it is possible to keep the ball entering the goal was.
sentences.chinese: 如果你照着角旗踢，就有可能讓球進入球門了。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.
sentences.chinese: 守門員用手掌勉強把球擋過球門橫木。

sentences.english: Joshi's proposed shift significantly moves the economic goalposts for digital print.
sentences.chinese: 喬希提出的舉動明顯轉變經濟球門柱的數碼印刷。

sentences.english: The ball screwed and flew into the goal.
sentences.chinese: 皮球旋轉着飛進了球門。

sentences.english: The star half-back jetted toward the goal line .
sentences.chinese: 那個球星中鋒衝向球門線。

sentences.english: Her shot went whistling past the goalpost .
sentences.chinese: 她的射門呼嘯着越過球門柱。

sentences.english: The same goes for shooting: he had no shots on or off target.
sentences.chinese: 也沒有任何射門，無論是射中球門或者射飛。

sentences.english: He could see only the hazy outline of the goalposts.
sentences.chinese: 他只能看見球門柱模糊的輪廓。

sentences.english: He is nearer to his opponents' goal line than both the ball and the second last opponent.
sentences.chinese: 他比球和倒數第二個對方的球員更靠近對手的球門線。

sentences.english: His wicked trick is to get the kids to kick bricks and lick the cricket ticket.
sentences.chinese: 他的缺德惡作劇是讓孩子們踢磚和舔板球門。

sentences.english: The centre forward headed the ball into goal .
sentences.chinese: 中鋒用頭將球頂入球門。

sentences.english: I used to use my brother as a goalpost.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經把我的弟弟當球門柱用過。

sentences.english: Who is keeping goal/is in goal (ie is goalkeeper ) for Arsenal?
The footballer butted the ball in( to the goal).
sentences.chinese: 足球運動員用頭把球頂入球門。

definition: to mess sth up/to screw up
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
to open fire/to shoot a gun
